title: Implement Accessibility and Performance Optimizations
description: Ensure the dashboard widget customization system meets accessibility standards and performs optimally across devices. This includes implementing proper ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, screen reader support, performance optimizations for large widget counts, and smooth animations. Acceptance criteria: All dashboard interactions are fully keyboard navigable, proper ARIA labels and roles implemented for screen readers, drag-and-drop operations have keyboard alternatives, animations respect prefers-reduced-motion preferences, dashboard renders efficiently with 20+ widgets, memory usage remains stable during frequent widget operations, touch interactions meet mobile accessibility guidelines, focus management works correctly during widget add/remove/resize operations.
